about_the_game:
Take charge of important rail operations with Just Trains’ UK Military Wagon Pack.

Seen throughout the UK, the KFA 'Warflat' and KWA 'Warwell' wagons are used by the Ministry of Defence (MOD) to carry loads such as the Warrior and Scorpion Infantry Fighting Vehicle (IFVs). These are the largest military vehicles to travel by rail in the UK and move between various MOD bases. With Just Trains’ UK Military Wagon Pack, you can experience hauling these unique loads which are represented in exacting detail.

Included Scenarios


A duo of Standard scenarios are included for the Portsmouth Direct Line: London Waterloo – Portsmouth route:

  • [MOD1] 6V38 – Diverted Marchwood MOD to Didcot
  • [MOD2] 6V38 – Knocking Out the Crippled Wagons

More scenarios are available on the Steam Workshop online and in-game. Train Simulator’s Steam Workshop scenarios are free and easy to download, adding many more hours of exciting gameplay. With scenarios being added daily, why don’t you check it out now!

Key Features


  • KFA 'Warflat' wagon
  • KWA 'Warwell' wagon
  • Warrior and Scorpion Infantry Fighting Vehicles
  • Loaded, unloaded and taillamp variants
  • Highly detailed modelling
  • High quality textures
  • Correct wagon numbering
  • 2 scenarios for the Portsmouth Direct Line: London Waterloo – Portsmouth route
  • Download size: 14.2mb

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 / 8.1
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Core 2 Duo (3.2 GHz Core 2 Duo recommended), AMD Athlon MP (multiprocessor variant or comparable processors)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB - 1GB with Pixel Shader 3.0 (AGP PCIe only)
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 40 GB HD space
  • Sound: Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional: Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
  • Graphics: Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required
  • Additional: Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
